nodes.text: 2X-7KPR ("Tooex") was a green domed KPR servant droid offered by the Jawa tribe lead by Nebit to Owen Lars in the same auction where he bought C-3PO and R2-D2.
The droid was stolen from Jabba Desilijic Tiure and was capable of monitoring floodlights and perimeters at Imperial Outposts. It was also capable of maintaining security devices.
